scripts.dev:db:migrate: npm run tsc src/pg/config/index && sequelize db:migrate '--config' src/pg/config/index.js '--migrations-path' src/pg/migrations
scripts.dev:db:migrate:undo: npm run tsc src/pg/config/index && sequelize db:migrate:undo '--config' src/pg/config/index.js '--migrations-path' src/pg/migrations
scripts.dev:db:migrate:undo:all: npm run tsc src/pg/config/index && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all '--config' src/pg/config/index.js '--migrations-path' src/pg/migrations '--to'
scripts.dev:db:seed:all: npm run tsc src/pg/config/index && sequelize db:seed:all '--config' src/pg/config/index.js '--seeders-path' src/pg/seeders
scripts.dev:model:generate:post: sequelize model:generate '--name' post '--attributes' text:text '--migrations-path' src/pg/migrations '--models-path' src/pg/models
scripts.dev:model:generate:user: sequelize model:generate '--name' user '--attributes' username:text,avatar:text '--migrations-path' src/pg/migrations '--models-path' src/pg/models
scripts.dev:seed:generate: npm run tsc src/pg/config/index && sequelize seed:generate '--config' src/pg/config/index.js '--seeders-path' src/pg/seeders '--name'
scripts.start: npm run start:pg-docker && npm run start:pg-graphql
scripts.ts: npm install cross-env nodemon ts-node && cross-env DEBUG=apollo-server:* nodemon '--watch' src
